page.title: 14SOCIAL CONCERNS contd.
page.content: The{crime rate}in Moseley is very high as it accounts for{25%}of the total crimes reported to Kings Heath police station.The reason for there being so many burglaries in Moseley is that there are many insecure flats where students live,and are out for most of the day so it is easy to break into them.Another very common crime is the stealing or breaking in of cars.The age group that is most involved in crime are the{16_25 year olds.}People are driven to crime mainly because of the lack of money,unemployment, and boredom.The crime rate is now increasing. Due to high crime rate some house holders have set up{home schemes designed to watch out for crime, and if necessary to contact the police. Sometimes householders have been forced to act before the police.
